title: Jet airways and a slab-serif...
content:
Hi again

This one is from a Jet airways ad:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014946im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/jet-airways_4301.jpg)

and here’s a slab serif that seems to be doing the rounds lately...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014946im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/museum-of-art-and-history_4223.jpg)

All hail the type masters - thank you for your help!

Clinton

 [‹ Font ID: Branding face of Wizzair](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014946/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45183 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID, possibly super easy ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014946/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45184 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cisfor

comments.content: [The Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014946/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=theserif&x=0&y=0) by Luc de groot for the one below.
Thank you Renko. Any ideas for jet airways? Anyone?

It looks custom. Possibly based on Perpetua.

- Lex
